name: Shoot Loop VR
description:
Set in a realistic wild west environment, Shoot Loop VR gives the player full immersion into the spirit of the age. Three weapons of choice and infinite mastery cap. Three different shooting ranges that await to be conquered. Grab the gun and show'em who's the hawkeye! Show your prowess and accuracy by hitting as many targets as you can, collecting all bonuses and setting an unbeatable score.


Features:

- Realistic Environment!
- Full 3D immersion!
- Realistic ballistics, ricochets and physics!
- Realistic 3D sounds!
- Incredible graphics that create a feel of palpable reality!
- Easy-to-use controls!
- Room-Scale immersion support!
